sections.heading: of intent to appeal to district court; procedure
sections.text: (1) A prosecuting attorney may take exception to any ruling or decision of the county court made during the prosecution of a cause by presenting to the court a notice of intent to take an appeal to the district court with reference to the rulings or d

sections.heading: 29-2317 to 29-2319 outline exception proceedings which allow prosecuting attorneys to take exception to any ruling or decision of the county court by presenting to the court a notice of intent to take an appeal to the district court
sections.text: In re Interest of Lori S., 20 Neb. App. 152, 819 N.W.2d 736 (2012)
